roleset.name: taking aback, offending
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet, offend.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1.

example.name: Neg and arg1
example.text: I had the misfortune of taking a year of courses at this place 4 years ago - no offense to the OP who sounds like a pretty cool guy but it 's garbage and nobody takes it seriously .
example.arg: to the OP who sounds like a pretty cool guy
